```{css, echo=FALSE}
.program-table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
  margin: 20px 0;
}

.time-column {
  width: 15%;
  vertical-align: top;
  padding: 10px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

.session-block {
  background-color:#ededed;  /* Gray for sessions */
  color: black;
  padding: 15px;
  margin: 5px 0;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.meal-block {
  background-color: #ADD8E6;  /* Blue for meals */
  color: black;
  padding: 15px;
  margin: 5px 0;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.date-header {
  background-color: #2c3e50;  
  color: white;
  padding: 12px;
  font-size: 1.4em;
  font-weight: bold;
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.speaker-list {
  margin: 10px 0 0 20px;
}

.speaker-list li {
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  line-height: 1.4;
}
```
